article_metadata.author: Special to the Register

og.description: Exclamations of “This is so cool!” and “Eeew!” were heard in Glenn Marshall Elementary School’s gym on Tuesday as fourth- and fifth-graders learned all about their bodies and its organs
og.title: GME students learn ‘Life is Cool’
